title: Terminator Salvation (2009) [Ghost]
description:
MOVIE INFORMATION
_________________

Title: Terminator Salvation
Year: 2009
IMDb rating: 6.7
Director: McG
Genre: Action/Drama/Sci-Fi/Thriller
Featuring Christian Bale, Sam Worthington, Anton Yelchin
Description: After Skynet has destroyed much of humanity in a nuclear holocaust, a group of survivors led by John Connor struggles to keep the machines from finishing the job.


PRODUCT
_______

Format: DVD
Edition: Theatrical Edition, 110 minutes (according to box), Dutch retail 2010
Spoken Language: English
Subtitle Language: English
Subtitles taken from DVD, converted to Subrip format with OCR in SubtitleEdit. Minor fixes applied.
Final size:
- Terminator Salvation: 748MB (709MB video, 38.1MB audio)
- Focus Points (extra): 194MB (184MB video, 9.83MB audio)
- Moto-Terminators (extra): 56.1MB (53.2MB video, 2.78MB audio)
- Reforging the Future (extra): 124MB (117MB video, 6.29MB audio)


CODECS AND CHANNELS
___________________

Video Codec: H264 - MPEG-4 AVC
Resolution: 720x428 (720x572 for extras)
Framerate: 25fps
Average Bitrate: 901kbps (908kbps for Moto-Terminators)
Preprocessing with AviSynth script, to auto-crop, convert to YV12 and degrain.
Encoded with x264: program --preset placebo --tune film --pass 2 --bitrate 900 --stats ".stats" --deblock -2:-3 --ratetol 4.0 --rc-lookahead 250 --merange 64 --output "output" "input"

Audio Codec: AAC-HE
Channels: Stereo
Sample rate: 48000Hz
Bitrate: 48kbps
Encoded with Q-AAC

Subtitles: Subrip
Source: DVD Retail
Slightly modified:
- Fixed some mistakes in the retail subs, such as ellipsis with 4 dots and such.
- For extras, added italics to off-scene narration.
